title: 820-3115 No green light
message:
Hello. 
I have this 820-3115-A.
Initially turns on for 3 seconds and then off. Had a lot of liquid damage around and under U1800. I protected U1800, added flux and reflowed the area and cleaned with ultrasonic cleaner. 

Then the board had the same issue and I noticed that U7000 was getting a little hot (noticed it with thermal camera) so I replaced it, after that PP3V42_G3H went to 4V so replaced R7021 and R7022 and PP3V42_G3H is ok again but no green light and no attempt to turn on, just takes 37mA.

I reflowed the SMC and no change.

Any suggestion?


Thanks!!

title: 820-3115 No green light
message:
What is the exact PPBUS_G3H voltage?
Do you get 3V3_S5/SUS?

title: 820-3115 No green light
message:
PPBUS_G3H: 12.65v
PP3V3_SUS: 0v

Q7820: 
Pin4: 3.3v
Pin3: 3.3v
Pin1:0v

P5V_3V3_SUS_EN: 4mV


Doubt: I have some differences on the names on the nets between the boardview and the schematic. Is that ok? Should I look for another version?
For example. Q7820 Pin1is: PP3V3_SUS on brd and PP3V3_SUS_FET on pdf.

According to the schematic they are the same right?

title: 820-3115 No green light
message:
Slight differences appear between Power FETs packages on Apple schematics and boardviews.
Use surrounding components to locate signals and power rails correctly.

Looks like missing PM_SLP_SUS_EN.
Check SMC_ADAPTER_EN, PM_DSW_PWRGD, PCH_DSWVRMEN, PM_BATLOW_L and PCH's RTC signals.

title: 820-3115 No green light
message:
SMC_ADAPTER_EN: 4mV
PM_DSW_PWRGD: 40mV
PCH_DSWVRMEN: 3.22V
PM_BATLOW_L: 40mV
PCH_SRTCRST_L: 3.33V
PPVRTC_G3H: 3.34V
RTC_RESET_L: 3.34V


Thanks

title: 820-3115 No green light
message:
Looks like SMC issue.
Reball it first; if still the same, change SMC.

title: 820-3115 No green light
message:
Ok, I will do it.

Can I replace the SMC of a 820-3115-A with the SMC of a 820-3115-B?

title: 820-3115 No green light
message: Reballing on the SMC worked but I have initial issue. Now I have green light, turns on, takes 231mA and then off.

title: 820-3115 No green light
message:
Which voltages appear?
Do you get VCORE?
PLT_RESET_L comes high?

Try to start in SMC bypass mode.
